resources.string: Bienvenido,\n\n no había cuenta para ti aún - entonces te hemos creado una. Nota - esta cuenta no esta asegurada por ningúna contraseña para facilitar su uso - entonces solo la debes usar como una billetera caliente para algunas bebidas.

This is a native Android Ethereum light client wallet.

It uses the in process node as ethereum light client from the go-ethereum project.

Big shout out to karalabe, fjl, zsfelfoldi and obscuren here - awesome work!

This alpha uses the rinkeby testnet.

WALLΞTH is trying to be as decentralized as possible. Hence it is using a light client and not centralized pre-configured nodes. Unfortunately we cannot be fully decentralized yet. For getting the exchange rates for (fiat) references we are querying cryptocompare and to get transactions we use the great etherscan.io service. The app will work if these services are down for some reason - but you might miss some features like up to date exchange rates. As soon as it is possible to get these things in a decentralized manner we will try to use it.

Our wonderful Icon is from Michael Cook.

Be aware that this is an alpha and there will be bugs. There are also some known issues like this one and this one

The project was started by ligi as this is not only needed as a wallet - but also as a building block for the espass project

The project is libre software (aka FOSS/free/open source) - you can find code and open issues on the WALLΞTH GitHub Organisation

Please have a great time with this app and we are happy about feedback, donations, pull-requests ..-)

The ideal place for feedback is our sub-reddit https://www.reddit.com/r/walleth You can find the source on github
Usted puede usar este Código QR para solicitar una transacción:

You might share this address with the hashtag #walleth on social media to get test ether.
LIGI will monitor twitter and has some test-ether collected since the launch of rinkeby.
Also you can pass on the test ether you got to users you see using this hashtag and exercise transactions this way.
Hay un tema claro y uno oscuro

"Esta cuenta fue creada para usted, entonces no tiene transacciones/valor aún. Usted ahora podría presionar el botón verde para enviar valor a esta cuenta o importar una cuenta existente. Usted puede encontrar las funciones para eso en el desplegable de la izquierda "
Esta es la llave privada para tu cuenta de Ethereum - almacenela de forma segura y recuerde la contraseña correspondiente
No sé pudó interpretar su intensión para escanear. Actualmente sólo se soporta: ERC67, Direcciones, ECDSA-Key, JSON(UTC-) Llaves
No App found to handle ACTION_OPEN_DOCUMENT - please report this as a problem to your phone-/ROM-provider
Sin fondos con la comisión dada
